problem.title: The Problem
problem.quote: “We are living in an era of ‘Subscription Creep’. We trade long-term financial freedom for short-term digital convenience, 10 € at a time.”

cta.title: Take back the keys.
cta.subtitle: Recurio is free for up to 5 subscriptions. No credit card required.

hero_component.description: Recurio brings clarity to your recurring footprint. No aggressive budgeting—just honest data on how your choices compound over time.
hero_component.tip: Tip: Click a subscription to see how it impacts your monthly / yearly burn.

features_component.intro: Recurio was built on the principle that if you can't see the total impact, you can't make an informed choice.

cost_normalization.title: Cost Normalization
cost_normalization.description: We struggle to compare a 12 €/mo app with a 120 €/year service. Recurio translates every commitment into a single, normalized "Burn Rate," exposing the true weight of your digital footprint.

time_awareness.title: Time Awareness
time_awareness.description: Our detection engine identifies upcoming charges within 7, 14, and 30-day windows. No "surprise" renewals.

manual_entry.title: Manual Entry
manual_entry.description: Intentionality starts with data entry. By manually adding subs, you confront the cost before the charge happens.

privacy.title: Privacy by Architecture.
privacy.description: Your financial footprint is processed and stored exclusively within your browser's secure environment—never on our servers. We don't just protect your data; we ensure we never have custody of it in the first place.

data_visualization_component.heading: The cost of "Just one more."

description.part_1: A 15 €/month subscription isn't a 15 € decision. It's an 1,800 € decision over a decade. When visualized, "small" choices reveal their true

data_visualization_component.disclaimer: Calculated based on a single 14.99 €/mo service. This does not account for annual price increases, which Recurio also tracks.
